goal.en: Modern life is closely related to technologies, such as communication technology, biotechnology, energy technology, etc., which affect our physical and mental health and well-being. What about the risk side of technology? This course can be divided into three parts, the first is physical and mental health, the second is critical thinking, and the third is sci/tech knowledge; their synthesis becomes scientific literacy. Taking genetically modified food as an example, how to live and eat healthfully? With the explosion of knowledge and the proliferation of media, how do we distinguish between good and bad information? What exactly is genetic modification? Secondly, can the mobile phone be placed next to the head while sleeping? Why are the base stations being protested against? Can radiation cure and cause Cancer? Global climate change intensifies, what about our national energy mix? In short, we discuss the basic knowledge of modern citizens to help our own health, but also promote social well-being and environmental protection. All disciplinary students are welcomed.
goal.ch: 現代生活與科技密切相關，例如通訊科技、生物科技、能源科技等，影響我們的身心健康與福祉。科技的風險呢？ 本課程可分成三部分，一是身心健康、二是明辨思考、三是科技知識；綜合成為科學素養（scientific literacy）。以基因改造食品為例，生活與飲食的健康之道？知識爆炸與媒體縱橫，我們如何辨別資訊的良窳正誤？到底基因改造是甚麼？其次，睡覺時手機可放頭旁嗎？為何基地台遭受抗爭？輻射可治癌與致癌嗎？全球氣候變遷加劇，國家能源組合呢？ 總之，我們討論現代國民的基本知識，幫助自身健康，也促進社會福祉與環保。歡迎各科系同學來修。

content.en:
Week #, Contents
1. Syllabus, Innovative Thinking, Health Promotion
2. Characteristics of Science: Falsifiable, Vertical Integration, Weight of Evidence
Technology Application: Well-being and Risk, Qualitative and Quantitative, Sustainable Development
3. Communication Technology and Modern Life
Electromagnetic Spectrum, Communication Principles, Risk Assessment of Communication Electromagnetic Waves
4. Microwave Technology and Modern Life
Principles and Applications of Microwave Ovens, Risks and Benefits
5. Electrical Technology ＆ Modern Life
High-voltage power lines and substations, Ubiquitous electromagnetic waves
6. Other applications of electromagnetic waves and modern life
From Static EMF to Visible Light, Declarations from WHO ＆ others
7. Food Technology and Modern Life
Food Chain, Population Growth and Earth‘s Carrying Capacity
8. Gene Technology and Modern Life
The Birth of Molecular Biology, Molecular Farm
9. Mid-term Exam
10. Environmental Controversy of GMO Technology
Substantial equivalence, assessing risk/benefit
11. Looking to the future of biotechnology
Integrating food and environmental needs, systems biology
12. Energy Technology and Modern Life
Energy and civilization, comparing various power generation systems
13. Energy Technology and Environmental Protection
14. Energy Technology and Sustainability
Economy, energy, environment and sustainability
15. Current Environmental Change and Ecology
Knowledge and action, mental and social well-being
16. Final Exam
content.ch:
週次. 內容
1. 課程大綱、革新思維、促進健康
2. 科學特徵：可否證、垂直累積、證據權重
科技應用：福祉與風險、定性與定量、永續發展
3. 通訊科技與現代生活
電磁頻譜、通訊原理、評估通訊電磁波的風險
4. 微波科技與現代生活
微波爐原理與應用、風險與福祉
5. 電力科技與現代生活
高壓電線與變電所、無所不在的電磁波
6. 其他電磁波的應用與現代生活
從靜電磁場到可見光、世界衛生組織等的聲明
7. 食品科技與現代生活
食物鏈、人口成長與地球承載力
8. 基因科技與現代生活
分子生物學的誕生、分子農場
9. 期中考
10. 基改科技的環保爭議
實質等同的意涵、評估風險福祉
11. 展望生物科技的未來
整合食物與環保需求、系統生物學
12. 能源科技與現代生活
能源與文明、比較各式發電系統
13. 能源科技與環保
選擇科技是取捨問題、定量策略
14. 能源科技與永續
經濟與能源與環境、永續的現代意涵
15. 當前環境變遷與生態
知識與行動、身心健康與社會福祉
16. 期末考
